attributes.action: Allow Autisim and Aspergers Syndrome to be a recognised disability to gain support
attributes.additional_details: Autistic people are often ignored and told that they don't need help and support. I myself being autistic was put through school with absolutely no support at all. I got diagnosed when I was 15 even when my school found out they still did nothing to support me. At 16 I was forced to leave due to bullying by both fellow pupils and teachers. I moved from Wishaw where I resided back to Glasgow and got into a training course I still receive no support and am ridiculed by colleagues and employer. I can't stand and watch that happen to others with Autism or Aspergers I just wish for something to be done and other people not to suffer the way I did.

rejection.details: Molly, this constitutes correspondence on a personal issue. You need to make it less personal if you want it published.
